tool_description: Collects real-time traffic data from multiple sources including road sensors, GPS devices, and traffic APIs for a specified geographic area and time window.

latitude.description: Center latitude coordinate for data collection area (-90 to 90)

longitude.description: Center longitude coordinate for data collection area (-180 to 180)

radius_km.description: Radius in kilometers for data collection area (0.1 to 100)

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude must be between -180 and 180.
Invalid radius: Radius must be between 0.1 and 100 kilometers.
Unsupported data source: Use only [sensors, gps, api, camera].
No data available: No traffic data found for the specified area and time.
usage: Provide latitude, longitude, and radius_km to define the collection area. Optionally specify data_sources array to limit which sources to query.

timestamp.description: When the data was collected in ISO 8601 format

road_segments.description: List of road segment identifiers with traffic data

traffic_speeds.description: Current average speeds for each road segment in km/h

congestion_levels.description: Congestion level for each segment: low, moderate, heavy, severe
